Detailed Description

Object for making new analysis streams from a text specification.

Encapsulates all the work of separately making chipstream, pm adjuster and quantification methods.

Definition at line 56 of file AnalysisStreamFactory.h.

void AnalysisStreamFactory::fillInAnalysisStream ( AnalysisStream *  stream,
ChipLayout &  layout,
std::string &  pmSpec,
std::vector< std::string > &  chipStreamSpec,
std::string &  name 
) [protected]

Utility function to fill the chipstream and pm adjuster portions of analysisstream.

Allows functions like constructAnalysisStream() and constructExpressionAnalysisStream() to share same methods for doing this and then just cap with QuantificationMethod.

Parameters:
stream - Stream to be filled in.
layout - Information about layout of probes on chip.
pmSpec - String description of pm adjuster.
chipStreamSpec - Vector of strings describing chipstream modules to be created.
name - Name to be filled in as pm adjusters and chipstream modules are created.

Definition at line 58 of file AnalysisStreamFactory.cpp.

Referenced by constructAnalysisStream(), constructExpressionAnalysisStream(), and constructGTypeAnalysisStream().
